title: DatasetDefinition
description: The DatasetDefinition stored as definition.pbidataset holds information about the overall dataset definition. This file is required.

DatasetSettings.title: Settings
DatasetSettings.description: Settings for this dataset that do not impact the behavior of the data model itself. Instead, these settings control the behavior of other Power BI features associated with the dataset.

qnaEnabled.title: QnaEnabled
qnaEnabled.description: Whether Q&A is enabled for this dataset.

qnaLsdlSharingPermissions.title: QnaLsdlSharingPermissions
qnaLsdlSharingPermissions.description: Describes how the linguistic schema (LSDL) can be shared with other users within the same tenant. Allowed values are 0 (LSDL can be shared with users with read permission) and 1 (LSDL can be shared with all users).

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the dataset artifact file format. This also serves as the version number for the .pbidataset file format.
